Description:
Various protocols maybe used to put data on the device for exfil or infil

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Stage Data
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%tftp%' or log like '%rcp%' or log like '%puts%' or log like '%copy%' or log like '%configure replace%' or log like '%archive tar%')
